item.title: By: Harvey the PHP Developer
item.dc:creator: Harvey the PHP Developer
item.description:
Totally agree about the "wait for PHP6" statement. I found that almost all my old code just worked straight away when moving to PHP5, so the only thing holding everyone back is the web hosts who don't want to upgrade.
I'm sure this will convince many to move to PHP5, but then we may have to wait a few more years for them to go to PHP6.
Hmmmm.
item.content:encoded:
Totally agree about the “wait for PHP6” statement. I found that almost all my old code just worked straight away when moving to PHP5, so the only thing holding everyone back is the web hosts who don’t want to upgrade.

I’m sure this will convince many to move to PHP5, but then we may have to wait a few more years for them to go to PHP6.

Hmmmm.
